feat: Initial project setup - Angular v20 with Material (Part 1)

Project Setup:
- Angular v20.3.7 with standalone components
- Angular Material v20.2.10 with custom theme
- TypeScript strict mode enabled
- RxJS ~7.8.0

Features Implemented:
- Complete folder structure (core, features, shared, layout)
- Lazy loading routes configuration
- Material 3 theming with dark mode support
- Path mappings (@core, @shared, @features, @layout, @environments)
- Environment configuration files
- ESLint + Prettier configuration
- Global SCSS variables and mixins
- Functional guards and interceptors (placeholders)
- Core models (User, Auth)

Configuration:
- provideRouter with PreloadAllModules
- provideHttpClient with XSRF protection
- provideAnimations for Material
- Custom Material theme (azure-blue palette)
- Responsive breakpoints and utilities
- Accessibility support (WCAG 2.1 AA)

Dependencies:
- @angular/animations: ^20.3.7
- @angular/material: ^20.2.10
- @angular/cdk: ^20.2.10
- qrcode: ^1.5.4 (for 2FA)
- ESLint + Angular ESLint: ^20.4.0

Build Status: SUCCESSFUL
Bundle size: 324.24 kB | 86.58 kB (gzip)
